plot outline: Mahesh saves Ravikanth from the goons of Verumpuli, a local politician whose enemity the businessman has earned as a result of beating him to a deal. In the hope that his job will help him get close to Suchi and eventually win her love. However, before he can do so, there is trouble on the family front. What happens next forms the rest of the story.
title: Kadhal Solla Aasai
plot: Mahesh saves Ravikanth from the goons of Verumpuli, a local politician whose enemity the businessman has earned as a result of beating him to a deal. In the hope that his job will help him get close to Suchi and eventually win her love. However, before he can do so, there is trouble on the family front. What happens next forms the rest of the story.
